mapper.select: select id, cartId, userId, itemId, itemName, itemOption, itemPrice, itemCount, itemDeliveryFee, categoryName, subCategoryName, storeName, fileName, fileSavedPath from vw_cart_item where cartId = #{cartId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart_item (cart_id, item_id, item_name, item_option, item_price) values (#{cartId}, #{itemId}, #{itemName}, #{itemOption}, #{itemPrice})
